SELECT ui.id, ui.code, ui.name, ui.email, ui.phone, ui.avatar, ui.user_id AS userId, ui.create_date AS createDate, tu.`STATUS` AS status FROM user_info ui LEFT JOIN t_user tu ON ( tu.USER_ID = ui.user_id ) WHERE 1 = 1
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.name},'%')
AND ui.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.code},'%')
AND ui.email LIKE CONCAT('%',#{userInfo.email},'%')
ORDER BY ui.create_date
